TopicTitle: Hit boxes and Structure Pieces Not connecting

Articles.Content: Wanting to make a geo stationary Sat network. But i am trying to find a good payload method. I believe i have found one but seems like there is some hitbox and structural connection problems. One there is obvious space in between parts but just hangs there. *Note i did have 3 xs decouplers on the bottom of engine not shroud*. Also you can tell that the structure pieces are not connected even though i used the the same setup on all of them(used Crtl and used nodes for parts no rotate or sliding), yet they don't stay connected. In the VAB it shows that is can connect, but as soon as you get into the world they are not. And if it is too heavy then why is the other side working as intended if it is symmetrical.
